alert.note: Alert for Colleton (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 06 at 11:10PM EDT until April 06 at 11:30PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF COLLETON COUNTY... At 1110 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Walterboro, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include: Walterboro, Cottageville and Round O. This warning includes I-95 in South Carolina between mile markers 58 and 63. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
